hunted.subtitle: Films You Absolutely Cannot Miss
hunted.discoverDescription: At MovieHunt.fr, our mission is simple: help you find the perfect film idea for every moment. Faced with content overload, we know how difficult it is to choose what film to watch. That's why we're launching a brand new exclusive badge today: the "Hunted" badge.
hunted.whatIsDescription1: The Hunted badge is our seal of approval. It's a visual in the form of a worn cinema ticket. It's placed on posters of films that truly deserve your attention ‚Äî impactful, memorable works, sometimes unknown, but always essential.
hunted.whatIsDescription2: When a film is "Hunted", it means it has been tracked, selected and validated by our cinematic gem radar.
hunted.whyReason1: Because too many films go unnoticed.
hunted.whyReason2: Because it's time to go off the beaten path.
hunted.whyReason3: Because you search every day for what film to watch ‚Äî and we've already done the sorting for you.
hunted.whereDescription: You'll find this badge on film posters directly on our site:
hunted.followHashtag: Also follow the hashtag #HuntedbyMovieHunt on Instagram and Twitter to discover the latest gems we've spotted.
hunted.summaryQuestion1: Looking for an original film idea?
hunted.summaryQuestion2: Hesitating about what film to watch tonight?
hunted.summaryAnswer: Trust the Hunted badge: a guarantee of quality, emotion and surprise.

howWeWork.title: How We Work at MovieHunt
howWeWork.intro: Looking for a film idea to watch? At MovieHunt, we watch and analyze each work ‚Äì known or unknown ‚Äì to offer you a unique film list. Our film reviews, written after watching in original version, highlight direction, screenplay, music, cinematography and acting. Find your next film to watch now.
howWeWork.knownAndUnknown: Known films... but especially unknown ones
howWeWork.knownDescription1: We take the time to watch a wide selection of films. Some are very well-known, but most of our discoveries concern more discreet works, sometimes overlooked. It's in these hidden gems that the strongest emotions are often found.
howWeWork.knownDescription2: When a film really stands out, it receives our Hunted by MovieHunt badge: a mark of trust to guide you to a film to watch.
howWeWork.criteriaIntro: For a feature film to appear in our recommended film list, we analyze several essential aspects:
howWeWork.directionDescription: The director's style and the consistency of their work.
howWeWork.soundtrackDescription: Because good music can transform a film into an unforgettable experience.
howWeWork.actingDescription: Always evaluated in original version (OV), to feel the true talent of the actors, not that of the dubbers.
howWeWork.screenplayDescription: The story must captivate, surprise and remain memorable.
howWeWork.cinematographyDescription: Every shot counts, and visual aesthetics contribute to emotional impact.
howWeWork.criteriaConclusion: Our film reviews are therefore carefully constructed to give a complete and honest vision of each work.
howWeWork.whyOVDescription: We watch all films only in original version. This allows us to truly judge the actors' performance, their intonations, their emotions and their authenticity. For us, it's the only way to remain faithful to the directors' and actors' intentions.
howWeWork.inspiringList: A film list that inspires you
howWeWork.inspiringDescription: On MovieHunt, you'll find much more than a simple review. Our goal is to create a varied film list that will always give you a film idea to watch according to your desires. Drama, action, thriller, comedy or even unknown independent films: there's always a title that will surprise you.
howWeWork.companion: üëâ MovieHunt is your trusted companion for every film idea. So, if you're looking for a film to watch, explore our selections and let yourself be guided by our discoveries.
